course.subject: HUMA
course.name: Buddhism and the Chinese Intellectual Tradition
course.description: This course will introduce the basic ideas of Buddhism, the main schools of Buddhism in China and their historical development. A number of Chinese Buddhist philosophical terms and some works written by Chinese monks and scholars will be selected for explanation and discussion. This course examines the dynamics of cultural interaction and choice-making with an emphasis on Buddhism as an Indian religion and its encounters with indigenous Chinese traditions and the outcomes of their interactions.

reviews.author: 真理平和完美
reviews.comment_content:
這是關於中國佛教哲學的課，用普通話講的，主要參考資料是屈大成的《佛學概論》。
Essay 要寫約2500字，學期末交，只要是關於中國佛教哲學的就可以，我寫的是《《圓覺經》研讀心得》，不夠深刻，得分不高。所以想得高分，還是要在哲理上深入探究。

Final 是簡答題，四道題，任選三道作答。第一題是詳細解釋“四聖諦”“三法印”，第二題是闡述大乘佛教相對於小乘佛教的不同，第三題是詳細論述“六家七宗”對“空”的解釋，第四題是闡述唯識宗的“八識”“五種性”“種子”等觀點。

有兩次課，黃老師邀請了一位觀成法師來講，觀成法師對唯識學有研究，剛寫完了新書《八識規矩頌》，還送了好多本給我們，我也有幸得到一本，還請法師簽了名。不過並沒有講得很難。

以下是 Course Description 和 Intended Learning Outcomes
Course Description:
Buddhism as an Indian religion encountered with the Chinese intellectual tradition, the outcome of which was the establishment of the main schools of Buddhism in China. This course will introduce the basic ideas of Buddhism, the main schools of Buddhism in China and their historical development. Some representative work will be selected and discussed.

Intended Learning Outcomes
On completion of the course, students will: 1. acquire basic technique of writing an academic report; 2. be able to identify, remember and explain key concepts of the spirit, development and basic doctrines of Buddhism as well as the main schools of Chinese Buddhism; 3. be able to compare and contrast different theories in Chinese Buddhism and evaluate the significance of these theories; 4. be able to evaluate and apply the Chinese Buddhist philosophy they have learnt to reflect upon different aspects of their lives and behaviour.

reviews.author: yzhanged
reviews.comment_content: 主要是讲佛教中的思想。教授更注重其中的哲学内容而非历史。并且一直用比较好理解的例子和故事讲很难懂的佛教内容。
reviews.comment_teaching: 教授讲的很好，也很有意思的。能把佛教讲的挺吸引人的，至少不会困。
reviews.comment_grading: 不太好。主要是区分度太低，和平时的努力也没什么关系。可能就是都随便写写，最后也不知道答得怎么样。毕竟每个人理解都太不一样了，过于主观的课其实是不太适合明确按等级给龟的。
reviews.comment_workload: 很低的，一篇2500字的essay，真正写的话你会发现字数不够写的，一个final考试，没有其他。

reviews.author: iopuit
reviews.comment_content: 这门课非常简单，而且是用中文授课，平时没有作业，只有一个paper和一个final.课程是有关佛教在中国的发展，会讲佛教的起源、哲学思想还有中国的几大宗派。总之是一门非常轻松、教授讲的又很清楚的课。大陆的学生去上的话应该会改观之前对佛教的想法，另外还有马来西亚和印尼的华裔的同学也会选。paper是自己找题目，final的话老师不会告诉你要考的内容，但是范畴就在那儿了，只要临时抱佛教（这个是真正的临时抱佛脚啦~）就可以拿高分
reviews.comment_teaching: Professor讲的清晰易懂非常有条理
reviews.comment_grading: Grading不太清楚具体的情况，但是如果认真学不会有太差的成绩。教授会可以压低一下绝对分但是给的grade个人认为还是不错的
reviews.comment_workload:
复习考试的work load几乎不存在，只有大概上课做的20页笔记需要看一看。然后还有几篇很短的补充材料。
写的paper需要读过相关的书目，但是相比于其他huma的课essay还是比较好写的。
课后基本不用复习就可以

reviews.author: zzzz24
reviews.comment_content:
The development of buddhism.
佛教基本概念
佛教各个门类的思想
reviews.comment_teaching: Teaching is illustrative. Professor is trying to explain every concept clearly.
reviews.comment_grading:
Grading is OK. But be careful with the final ! It is an open-book exam. You need to write (copy the book) as much as possible. at least 6-7 pages for 3 questions. Do not just write one paragraph. You need to give at least one-page-long answer for one question.

!!!!!You need to explain in detail every single sub-concept in one question rather than just give a general description!!!! This is important.

Otherwise you will get a very low score. The professor won't tell you this grading schema in advance. So make sure you write as much as you can.
reviews.comment_workload: Very light. But if you want to have a high score in essay, you need to do some extra reading.
